titles.title: We Say Yes To The Will Of Our Father

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
We say yes to the will of our Father,
Yes to the love of His Son,
And as He speaks to us from His holy word,
Do we trust enough to do all that we've heard?
And when He promises,
Do we believe that He is able?
Yes. (Yes.) Yes. (Yes.) Yes. (Yes.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To the Spirit's call, we need not fear at all,
When we start by saying,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Harden not your hearts in giving all you are,
Start by saying,
